name: WizzTheWizard
description:
Meet Wizz, an employee of Bob’s Bar and Grill who fantasizes about being a wizard, as he takes orders and deals with customer complaints in order to earn money to buy his wife a birthday present.

Controls

Movement:

  • Keyboard: WASD, Arrow Keys
  • Controller: D-Pad, Left stick

Accept:

  • Keyboard: Space, Enter, X
  • Controller: Button South

Decline:

  • Keyboard: Backspace, Z
  • Controller: Button East
